# Tổng thu nhập = Lương cơ bản + Phúc lợi - AN TOÀN basic = rules.get('BASIC', 0.0) benefits = rules.get('BENEFITS', 0.0)
# Chuyển đổi an toàn if basic is None: basic = 0.0 if benefits is None: benefits = 0.0
result = float(basic) + float(benefits)

# Thu nhập trước thuế = Gross - BHXH - BHYT - BHTN gross = rules.get('GROSS', 0.0) or 0.0 bhxh = abs(rules.get('BHXH', 0.0) or 0.0) bhyt = abs(rules.get('BHYT', 0.0) or 0.0) bhtn = abs(rules.get('BHTN', 0.0) or 0.0)
result = float(gross) - float(bhxh) - float(bhyt) - float(bhtn)

# Tính thuế TNCN theo bậc thang lũy tiến taxable = rules.get('TAXABLE', 0.0) or 0.0 taxable = float(taxable)
# Giảm trừ gia cảnh: 11 triệu cho bản thân deduction = 11000000
# Thu nhập tính thuế taxable_after_deduction = max(0, taxable - deduction)
# Bậc thang thuế TNCN 2024 tax = 0.0 if taxable_after_deduction <= 5000000: tax = taxable_after_deduction * 0.05 elif taxable_after_deduction <= 10000000: tax = 5000000 * 0.05 + (taxable_after_deduction - 5000000) * 0.10 elif taxable_after_deduction <= 18000000: tax = 5000000 * 0.05 + 5000000 * 0.10 + (taxable_after_deduction - 10000000) * 0.15 elif taxable_after_deduction <= 32000000: tax = 5000000 * 0.05 + 5000000 * 0.10 + 8000000 * 0.15 + (taxable_after_deduction - 18000000) * 0.20 elif taxable_after_deduction <= 52000000: tax = 5000000 * 0.05 + 5000000 * 0.10 + 8000000 * 0.15 + 14000000 * 0.20 + (taxable_after_deduction - 32000000) * 0.25 elif taxable_after_deduction <= 80000000: tax = 5000000 * 0.05 + 5000000 * 0.10 + 8000000 * 0.15 + 14000000 * 0.20 + 20000000 * 0.25 + (taxable_after_deduction - 52000000) * 0.30 else: tax = 5000000 * 0.05 + 5000000 * 0.10 + 8000000 * 0.15 + 14000000 * 0.20 + 20000000 * 0.25 + 28000000 * 0.30 + (taxable_after_deduction - 80000000) * 0.35
result = -tax

# Lương thực nhận = Gross - BHXH - BHYT - BHTN - Thuế TNCN gross = rules.get('GROSS', 0.0) or 0.0 bhxh = abs(rules.get('BHXH', 0.0) or 0.0) bhyt = abs(rules.get('BHYT', 0.0) or 0.0) bhtn = abs(rules.get('BHTN', 0.0) or 0.0) pit = abs(rules.get('PIT', 0.0) or 0.0)
